page.title: 04MONEY MATTERS
page.content: The fact that Rottingdean and Saltdean are relatively affulent suburbs is reflected in the large number of banks and building societies. Building Societies are also heavily represented. Both villages have numerous local and national estate agents. Building Society representation is limited to an agency basis in Saltdean reflecting its lower level of commercial activity and income of its population in comparison with Rottingdean with its large retired population.Houses in Rottingdean are generally older with nothing selling for less than Â£50,ooo and many more for well over Â£100,000. Rottingdean is an urban village, Saltdean a sprawling suburb.
